ai.summary: Meadow Trail is a gentle 4.2 km hike in the UK, suitable for beginners. The route offers a relaxed walk through mild terrain with scenic countryside views, making it a great option for a short half-day outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily well-trodden paths with gentle grades. Expect a mix of dirt trails and grassy sections, with occasional uneven spots where roots or small rocks may be present.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and check the weather before you go. Stay on marked paths, be cautious on damp or muddy sections, and bring enough water. In rural areas of the UK, phone signal can be unreliable—carry a map or offline navigation and let someone know your plans.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on a smartphone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) in the UK; the trail is accessible year-round with proper weather preparation.

seo.title: Meadow Trail – Easy 4.2 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Meadow Trail, an easy 4.2 km hike in the UK. Enjoy gentle terrain, scenic countryside, and a beginner-friendly route.
